Content.Text:
...up! Come on, wake up! I'm telling you
to wake up!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? You're tired? I took the time to
wake you up, so come on! Show some
gratitude!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good morning. The goddess that I
talked to you about before has returned.
Come with us to pay your respects.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right, we're flying to the peak!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are. In front of the spring on
the peak.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you. Put out your hand.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Throw this into the spring. Something
really cool will happen, you'll see!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do it, come on! Losing your nerve?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Dum-Da-Da-DAA!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Hee hee, I'm not surprised you're
surprised! I'm the <BLUE>Harvest Goddess</BLUE> who
lives in this land.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been away for a while, but now my
work in the heavenly realm is finished
and I'm back! You must be <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look very promising! Quite
lovely. Have the Harvest Sprites told
you about the Sound Trees?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
They have? Great. You've done very well.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not at all, Goddess. I have only been
humbly serving you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You haven't done anything yet, sister!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Did you say something?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I mean... Y-You did almost everything,
sister!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Keep up the good work, <MYNAME>. As the
Goddess who lives in this land I'll be
here supporting you.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to talk with me for any
reason you can come to the spring and
throw in an offering. No garbage, okay?
<PAGE>
I have my own refined tastes, after all.
The same can be said of those living
here in town!
<PAGE>
Only certain things will make certain
people happy, so think carefully before
giving gifts!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's right. Just so you know, that
turnip you just threw in is a big
favorite of mine.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I prepared that for you!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You did? Thank you?

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not at all, Goddess. I have only been
humbly serving you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sister... You'll do anything to score
points?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having received a lovely treat, then, I
think I'd better be going.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I am expecting big things from
you. Keep on working hard for the town.
<PAGE>
See you soon!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the Goddess is expecting big
things from you! I'm actually jealous!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Betray those expectations and you'll pay
dearly, understand?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'll use our magic to send you back
home, then. Special service.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Keep working hard! We're supporting you
too, I guess. Just a little.

The Harvest Goddess... how lovely she
was. I'll have to try and meet her
expectations!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's get into the main event. I've
called you here today because I need to
ask something of you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not something I can explain easily
here, so let's start with a change of
scenery. Here we go!
